mapper.select: select id,is_update from s_oa_award where work_date like CONCAT(#{parMap.workDate},'%')

select aa.*,uadd.name add_name,usub.name sub_name from s_oa_award aa left join k_user uadd on uadd.jobnumber=aa.to_add_jobnumber left join k_user usub on usub.jobnumber=aa.to_sub_jobnumber where aa.work_date like CONCAT(#{parMap.workDate},'%')
and aa.finishedflag = 0
and aa.finishedflag != 0
order by aa.work_date desc,unit_id desc
limit #{parMap.pageNum},#{parMap.size}

select count(*) from s_oa_award aa where aa.work_date like CONCAT(#{parMap.workDate},'%')
and aa.finishedflag = 0
and aa.finishedflag != 0
